title: [SOLVED]Macbook air 11 (mid 2011) Charging issue
message: The macbook charge but get very hot charging port ,but only when you charge while using ,charging when is off no issue

title: [SOLVED]Macbook air 11 (mid 2011) Charging issue
message: You may have luck cleaning the contacts of the magsafe connector to reduce resistance. Its supposed to get slightly warm though, thats normal.

title: [SOLVED]Macbook air 11 (mid 2011) Charging issue
message: I try that before but its same ,and also charger get very hot ,I also try another charger and same

title: [SOLVED]Macbook air 11 (mid 2011) Charging issue
message: Replace IO board and use an original charger, none of that China crap!

title: [SOLVED]Macbook air 11 (mid 2011) Charging issue
message: Solved one resistor on IO board was blown thx
